Welcome to eudtrg documentation!¶

Documentation for eudtrg. Don’t confuse it with EUDTrig.

eudtrg is a tool for generating Self-modifying trigger systematically. eudtrg works on top of EUD Actions, so EUD Action Enabler will be needed when running eudtrg-generated maps.
